about.title: About me
about.description:
My name is Jes√∫s David and I am an aspiring software developer.
I am currently studying Software Engineering at the University of Colima.
I believe that the most important thing a developer must have is the ability to adapt and understand.
I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow.
My biggest interests are graphics programming, machine learning and backend development.
My favorite programming languages are C++ and Python.
I hope you enjoy this portfolio and feel free to contact me for any job opportunities or questions.
